Name: Mk12 5.56x45 Special Purpose Rifle DIY
Description: The Mk12 SPR is a high-precision rifle used by the US military, based on the AR-15 platform. This kit offers enhanced precision and versatility, attracting a large number of enthusiasts in both military and civilian circles. This particular Mk12 has undergone custom modifications, resulting in reduced recoil and improved ergonomics, featuring a custom paint job.
